description: Gets an Amazon Web Services Migration Hub Refactor Spaces route.

nested_items.name: AppendSourcePath
nested_items.description: If set to true, this option appends the source path to the service URL endpoint.

nested_items.name: ApplicationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the application that the route belongs to.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the route.

nested_items.name: CreatedByAccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the route creator.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the route is created.

nested_items.name: EnvironmentId
nested_items.description: Unique identifier of the environment.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the resource owner.

nested_items.name: AdditionalDetails
nested_items.description: Additional details about the error.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The error code associated with the error.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The message associated with the error.

nested_items.name: ResourceIdentifier
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of resource.

nested_items.name: IncludeChildPaths
nested_items.description: Indicates whether to match all subpaths of the given source path. If this value is false, requests must match the source path exactly before they are forwarded to this route's service.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that indicates when the route was last updated.

nested_items.name: Methods
nested_items.description: A list of HTTP methods to match. An empty list matches all values. If a method is present, only HTTP requests using that method are forwarded to this route's service.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: OwnerAccountId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID of the route owner.

nested_items.name: PathResourceToId
nested_items.description: A mapping of Amazon API Gateway path resources to resource IDs.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: RouteId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the route.

nested_items.name: RouteType
nested_items.description: The type of route.

nested_items.name: ServiceId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the service.

nested_items.name: SourcePath
nested_items.description: This is the path that Refactor Spaces uses to match traffic. Paths must start with / and are relative to the base of the application. To use path parameters in the source path, add a variable in curly braces. For example, the resource path {user} represents a path parameter called --user'.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the route.
(string) ---
(string) ---
